citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are some tools and approaches that can translate foreign-language audio to English in real time while you watch a video: üß† Software & Extensions Real-Time Translation Chrome Extensions ‚Äì Extensions like Speech Translator or Byrdhouse AI can listen to any video/audio playing in your browser and generate live translated text/audio. Chrome Web Store+1

sources.title: Microsoft is testing live translation on Intel and AMD Copilot Plus PCs
sources.snippet: Microsoft has begun testing its live translation feature on Intel and AMD-based Copilot Plus PCs, expanding its availability beyond the initial rollout on Qualcomm-powered devices. The feature, currently accessible to Windows 11 Insiders in the Dev Channel, translates audio from over 44 languages into real-time English subtitles, working with any audio played on the device‚Äîwhether from online videos, live conferences, or recordings. Supported languages include Spanish, French, Chinese, Russian, Korean, Arabic, and more. In addition to this expansion, Microsoft is enhancing the service on Qualcomm PCs to support translations into Simplified Chinese. This development is part of Microsoft‚Äôs broader effort to bring more AI-driven capabilities, such as the Recall feature for memory retrieval, to a wider range of hardware platforms.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Microsoft Copilot Plus Live Translation ‚Äì Built into certain Windows PCs, this can display live translated subtitles for any audio played on the device. The Verge
VLC (upcoming AI translation) ‚Äì The VLC player is demoing real-time AI subtitling and translation during playback, though widespread release may not be available yet. The Verge

üì± Apps & Mobile Tools Mobile Video Voice Translate Apps ‚Äì Some mobile apps on Android and iOS can translate the audio of a video to another language in real time or during playback by capturing the audio stream. Google Play
Lingvotube ‚Äì A mobile app that generates translated subtitles and voiceovers for videos you play, helpful on phones/tablets. App Store

üõ†Ô∏è Alternative Workflows Transcription + Translation Services ‚Äì Tools like Sonix, Smartcat, Wordly, Maestra, Rask.ai, HeyGen, Notta, etc. can auto-generate translations and subtitles for video audio, though many require uploading the video rather than real-time video playback.
